name: Fly A Rocket Into Space (F.A.R.I.S)
description:
Context: uploading this to my itch in an attempt to consolidate projects into a pseudo-portfolio

more context: I made this over Christmas break one year because I wanted to learn to make mobile games (I was also figuring out how to make ads and ended up putting way to many in so I recommend turning off your internet lol)

Fly A Rocket Into Space or F.A.R.I.S for short is a game where you try to get the rocket as high as you can before hitting something. collect coins and powerups to help you along.

Tap the screen to go up and rotate your phone to move from side to side.
